main.Query:
Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[View_LoanMainSecurity]'')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[View_LoanMainSecurity] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL ='CREATE VIEW [dbo].[View_LoanMainSecurity] AS Select Distinct FCL.DimPoolID , FCL.DimConsolidationID , FCL.LTVPassNo , FCL.DimLoanId , ISNULL(CMS.DimSecurityId, 0) As DimSecurityId , FC.ConsolidationDimTrustId From dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL (nolock) Inner Join dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC (nolock) On FC.DimConsolidationID = FCL.DimConsolidationId And FC.DimPoolId = FCL.DimPoolId And FC.LTVPassNo = FCL.LTVPassNo Left Join ( Select Distinct DimConsolidationID , DimPoolId , DimSecurityID , LTVPassNo From dbo.tblFactConsolidationSecurity FCS (nolock) Where SecurityRank = 1 )As CMS on CMS.DimPoolID = FCL.DimPoolID And CMS.LTVPassNo = FCL.LTVPassNo And CMS.DimConsolidationID = FCL.DimConsolidationID ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
